statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={4.9}, \displaystyle{b}={6.9}, \displaystyle{c}={7.9}, and \displaystyle{d}={10.1} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={97}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
